/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. A few cars are parked along the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. On the right side of the street, a lamppost stands tall, ready to illuminate the area as dusk falls. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a glimpse into the everyday life in Beijing, showcasing its natural beauty and urban charm.
